thread.title: Guest lineups for the Sunday news shows
thread.title_full: Guest lineups for the Sunday news shows

title: Guest lineups for the Sunday news shows
text:
Guest lineups for the Sunday news shows Tools 
Story Created: Oct 24, 2015 at 1:02 PM   24, 2015 at 1:02 PM EDT 
WASHINGTON (AP) — Guest lineups for the Sunday TV news shows: 
ABC's "This Week"— Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump. 
___ 
NBC's "Meet the Press"— Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson; Reps. Trey Gowdy, R-S.C., and Elijah Cummings, D-Md. 
___ 
CBS' "Face the Nation"— Trump; Republican presidential candidate Chris Christie; Reps. Devin Nunes, R-Calif., and Adam Schiff, D-Calif. 
___ 
CNN's "State of the Union"— Trump; Republican presidential candidate Marco Rubio; Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders. 
___
